directions: Melt butter in a medium skillet over medium-high heat.  Dredge tofu slices in flour and place in hot butter.  Brown slightly, then turn over and brown the other side.  Add water, wine and bouillon cubes; simmer for 10 minutes, or until bouillon completely dissolves.  Stir in mustard and honey.  Simmer until thickened.
ingredients: 1 pound firm tofu, sliced into 1/4 inch slices
title: Honey Mustard Tofu
